text: Aleksandra Sergeyevna Troitskaya (; 1896 — 1979) was a Soviet microbiologist- leprologist, candidate of medical sciences. Author of cancer vaccine.Трагическая судьба одного открытияВакцина против рака – открытие и закрытие Honorary Citizen of Kaluga (1996). Тайна Александры Троицкой ==Biography== Troitskaya was born in Bryankovo (now in Suvorovsky District of Tula Oblast), grew up in Kaluga. Тайна Александры Троицкой In 1917 she graduated from the Kaluga Diocesan School (she also studied with Konstantin Tsiolkovsky). In 1920s she worked as a teacher. Тайна Александры Троицкой In 1934 she graduated from Kharkiv National Medical University. In 1940-1951 a microbiologist, from 1946 Senior Researcher of the Astrakhan Leprosarium.Лаборатория инновационных биомедицинских технологий In 1946, at the Kazan Federal University, she defended her thesis on pain biotherapy in the treatment of leprosy.Александра Троицкая. Изобретатель и рационализатор Since 1951 (after retirement) she worked as a microbiologist in the laboratory of the Kaluga Oncologic Dispensary.Лаборатория инновационных биомедицинских технологий He discovered new strains of corynebacteria — Corynebacterium Krestovnikova / Troitskaya.RussianPatents.com – free online patent search by keyword, and category numbers in Russia Base inventions and the USSRО препарате Крестовниковой-Троицкой (КТ) Aleksandra Troitskaya died in 1979.
